original_text: It is the person who does wrong things who will die. A son will not receive punishment because of his father's sins. And a father will not receive punishment because of his son's sins. Righteous people will receive the good things that they deserve for the good things that they have done. But wicked people will receive the punishment that they deserve for the wicked things that they have done.
korean_text: 범죄하는 그 영혼은 죽을지라 아들은 아버지의 죄악을 담당하지 아니할 것이요 아버지는 아들의 죄악을 담당하지 아니하리니 의인의 공의도 자기에게로 돌아가고 악인의 악도 자기에게로 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: It is the person who does wrong things
A son will not receive punishment
And a father will not receive punishment
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아버지도 벌을 받지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Righteous people will receive the good things
sentences.korean_translation: 의로운 사람들은 좋은 것들을 받을 것이다

sentences.original_text: for the good things that they have done
But wicked people will receive the punishment
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 악한 사람들은 벌을 받을 것이다

sentences.original_text: for the wicked things that they have done
